message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both
I think a 60-40 split is fairer, given that you get to keep your money at full value while mine depreciates each round.
Considering the depreciation, I'm being generous with 57-43
I'm sticking with my previous offer. 60-40 is still the fairest split, considering the inflation affecting my share.
